snippet: A task force, formed after two hockey players were charged with sexual assault, said there was “a culture of sexual entitlement” among some players.
lead_paragraph: A task force, formed after two hockey players were charged with sexual assault, said there was “a culture of sexual entitlement” among some players.

headline.seo: B.U. Task Force Finds Oversight Problems in Hockey Program
headline.main: Boston University Task Force Finds Oversight Problems
headline.print_headline: Boston University Task Force Finds Oversight Problems
